name: Multi Theft Auto
description: Installs DVD version of GTA:SA and MTA to clean directory (useful when you want to have seperate installation just for MTA)
notes:
Leave all installation paths default
Don't install DirectX when asked to select components
Uncheck Launch MTA:SA in installer

files.gta: N/A:Select the installer for GTA San Andreas (setup.exe)

content:
files:
- gta: N/A:Select the installer for GTA San Andreas (setup.exe)
- mta: http://mirror.s4.mtasa.ohbah.com/mtasa/main/mtasa_xp-1.5.6.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/MTA San Andreas 1.5/Multi Theft Auto.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: winxp
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing GTA:SA...
    executable: gta
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /silent
    description: Installing MTA...
    executable: mta
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
